kDesc
This lightweight, future-tech clothing will help keep the wind out at those high altitudes. [#Legal]
Cette tenue légère et futuriste aidera à vous préserver du vent à haute altitude. [#Legal]
Diese leichte, Hightech-Kleidung schützt dich in großen Höhen vor dem Wind. [#Legal]
Quest'abbigliamento leggerissimo e iper tecnologico ti proteggerà dal vento anche in alta quota. [#Legal]
Este moderno y ligero atuendo te permitirá resguardarte del viento mientras vuelas por las alturas. [#Legal]
軽量ハイテックスーツで高度なフライトも可能！ [#Legal]
This lightweight, future-tech clothing will help keep the wind out at those high altitudes. [#Legal]
